name: Avoid duplicated Main Procedures (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all the main procedures having exactly the same number of code lines with the same number of comment lines and the same cyclomatic complexity.
output:
The report lists all the  PL1 duplicated Main Procedures.

It provides following information: 
-  duplicated PL1 Main Procedures full name
rationale: The aim is here to clean-up the code delivered in production.
remediation: Remove the main duplicated main procedure  and review the rest of the source code.
